data.eml:eml: Three new species of Glossobalanus (Hemichordata: Enteropneusta: Ptychoderidae) from western North America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cameron, Christopher B., Ostiguy, Angélica (2013): Three new species of Glossobalanus (Hemichordata: Enteropneusta: Ptychoderidae) from western North America. Zootaxa 3630 (1): 143-154, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3630.1.5
